title: Proposed pointless Thresh change for us sadists
body:
{{champion:412}} Q

Instead of stunning the target continuously, I suggest that the hook applies a short stun on hit and again when Thresh tugs the chain, with a silence over the duration.

They would be able to try and run away from Thresh, but they would get yanked back into the original path of the hook before they can cover any ground.

It doesn't actually introduce more counterplay, but it introduces the illusion of hope.

Just enough to make them try and struggle.

Writhe.

Like a worm on a hook.

replies.body: I like it, mainly because it changes nothing yet makes it much more satisfying.

Wouldn´t this change be a buff to Thresh ({{item:3139}} /{{summoner:1}})? Because after the change the initial stun would be removed but after a brief delay the target will be hit by another stun (which wouldn´t be removed by QSS and only the duration would be reduced by cleanse).

No it would probably be a nerf
Since ranged AD champions could still auto attack while being hooked (because with the change it only prevents abilities and movement)... and well Thresh is very often against ADC's who are ranged AD champions....

Hmmm...

That's quite an oversight.

They would probably have to be disarmed as well.

The intention is to have little to no functional change while making it feel more evil.

If there was a healer just out of range or even someone with {{item:3222}} , then the brief movement of the hooked Champion might allow them to get in range of the heal/cleanse when they previously would be just a bit too far away. That's more minor than being able to attack though.

It would have to be the equivalent of the polymorph effect, where you can move but nothing else.  Of course there are issues with reapplied stuns and tenacity as tenacity would no longer reduce the duration that the hook applies CC over, just the length of the small chunks of CC.

That could probably be coded around though where it is a debuff that prevents anything but movement and yanks them towards Thresh every .5 seconds.  That would be reduced by tenacity.

Well not like it is that big of a deal since there are already things that bypass tenacity...

Like knock ups, suppression and tethers which have CC effects (like Morgana ult which applies a slow) and of course reapplying CC like Varus/Singed/MF slow fields or Soraka silence field oh and Rylais with a DoT obviously tenacity doesn't do much against those things since even if the duration is reduced it is just refreshed (however it does help slightly by reducing how long the effect last after the reapplying effect is stopped)

Don´t think that the time window is that large...
1. for the player to react
2. for the animation come through 

If it´s possible that autoattacks can come through then only a minority will be able to use them.

> applies a short stun on hit and again when Thresh tugs the chain, with a silence over the duration.

Is what you said, but all i hear is "thresh bugfixes every single patch."
I love it just cause it fits his lore.
Fits Thresh thematically and this detail would make Thresh more satisfying to play than one can imagine, The experience would make you want to give away your soul to thresh.

Actually this is a nerf to its disengage potential without changing its engage or pick potential.

a VERY minor nerf, but it should be noted as one. (Auto attacks and all that)
Alright so I'm seeing a lot of functional issues. We could probably mame the models moonwalk like they do during Lee Sin's ult. That could work.
Don't touch Thresh. Thresh is perfect.
That really is sadistic.  It must ship out before the new gamemode.  It would make them more able to dodge skillshots though.
